test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-YearMonthDurationLT-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'lt' for xs:yearMonthDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-YearMonthDurationLT-3 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'lt' for xs:yearMonthDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.name: K-YearMonthDurationLT-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-YearMonthDurationLT-6 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'le' for xs:yearMonthDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-001
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer, $months as xs:integer ) { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat('P', $years, 'Y', $months, 'M')) }; not(local:yearMonthDuration(1, 1) lt xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"))

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-002
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:integer, $months as xs:integer ) { xs:yearMonthDuration(concat('P', $years, 'Y', $months, 'M')) }; not(local:yearMonthDuration(1, 1) le xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"))

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-003
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($yearMonthDuration as xs:yearMonthDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $yearMonthDuration }; exists(local:yearMonthDuration(xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"), fn:true()) lt xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"))

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-004
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($yearMonthDuration as xs:yearMonthDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $yearMonthDuration }; local:yearMonthDuration(xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"), fn:false()) lt xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y")

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-005
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($yearMonthDuration as xs:yearMonthDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $yearMonthDuration }; exists(local:yearMonthDuration(xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"), fn:true()) ge xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"))

test-case.name: cbcl-yearMonthDuration-less-than-006
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:yearMonthDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:yearMonthDuration($yearMonthDuration as xs:yearMonthDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $yearMonthDuration }; local:yearMonthDuration(xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y"), fn:false()) ge xs:yearMonthDuration("P0Y")
